0.text: Innate - Prowl: While in  brush, Nidalee gains  10% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, increased to 30% when facing a nearby  visible enemy  champion. Innate - Hunt: Hitting  monsters or enemy champions with  Javelin Toss, or  Bushwhack while they are nearby, will apply a Hunted mark and  reveal them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains  10% bonus movement speed, increased to 30% when facing a nearby Hunted target.  Additionally, Nidalee's first use of  Takedown and  Pounce against Hunted targets are empowered.
0.html:
Innate - Prowl: While in brush, Nidalee gains  10% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, increased to 30% when facing a nearby visible enemy champion.

Innate - Hunt: Hitting monsters or enemy champions with Javelin Toss, or Bushwhack while they are nearby, will apply a Hunted mark and reveal them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains  10% bonus movement speed, increased to 30% when facing a nearby Hunted target. Additionally, Nidalee's first use of Takedown and Pounce against Hunted targets are empowered.

1.text: The bonus movement speed from Prowl and Hunt can stack, but cannot exceed 30%.
1.html: The bonus movement speed from Prowl and Hunt can stack, but cannot exceed 30%.

0.text: Active: Nidalee hurls a javelin in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased by 0% − 200% (based on distance traveled).
0.html: Active: Nidalee hurls a javelin in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased by 0% − 200% (based on distance traveled).

0.text: Active: Nidalee lays a trap at the target location that becomes  stealthed after arming over 1.5 seconds, lasting for up to 120 seconds and granting  sight within its radius. The trap will spring upon contact with an enemy, dealing magic damage per second over 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Nidalee lays a trap at the target location that becomes stealthed after arming over 1.5 seconds, lasting for up to 120 seconds and granting sight within its radius. The trap will spring upon contact with an enemy, dealing magic damage per second over 4 seconds.

1.text: Traps have  6 maximum health and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 hit points from  ranged and 3 hit points from  melee). Up to a maximum of 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (based on level) traps may be active at once.
1.html: Traps have  6 maximum health and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 hit points from ranged and 3 hit points from melee). Up to a maximum of 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (based on level) traps may be active at once.

2.text: See Pets for more details about traps.
2.html: See Pets for more details about traps.

0.text: Active: Nidalee revitalizes herself or the target allied champion, granting  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds and  healing the target for an amount that is increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).
0.html: Active: Nidalee revitalizes herself or the target allied champion, granting  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds and healing the target for an amount that is increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).

0.text: Active: Nidalee empowers her next basic attack within 10 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  75 bonus range and be modified to deal magic damage that is increased by an amount for every 1% of target's missing health. The minimum damage can also be applied against  turrets.
0.html: Active: Nidalee empowers her next basic attack within 10 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain  75 bonus range and be modified to deal magic damage that is increased by an amount for every 1% of target's missing health. The minimum damage can also be applied against turrets.

1.text: Hunt Bonus: A Hunted target hit will take  40% increased damage.
1.html: Hunt Bonus: A Hunted target hit will take 40% increased damage.

2.text: Takedown  resets Nidalee's basic attack timer. Other damage converted to magic damage by Takedown are not increased by Takedown's respective effects. Nidalee loses Takedown's empowered attack immediately when she switches to  Human Form.
2.html: Takedown resets Nidalee's basic attack timer. Other damage converted to magic damage by Takedown are not increased by Takedown's respective effects. Nidalee loses Takedown's empowered attack immediately when she switches to Human Form.

0.text: Passive: Killing an enemy while in Cougar Form or using Pounce's Hunt bonus reduces Pounce's remaining  cooldown to a minimum value.
0.html: Passive: Killing an enemy while in Cougar Form or using Pounce's Hunt bonus reduces Pounce's remaining  cooldown to a minimum value.

1.text: Active: Nidalee  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies upon arrival.
1.html: Active: Nidalee dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies upon arrival.

2.text: Hunted Bonus: Nidalee can perform Pounce from an increased range on a Hunted enemy closest to the cursor. Nidalee can Pounce to a target location near a Hunted enemy if she is close to the Hunted enemy.
2.html: Hunted Bonus: Nidalee can perform Pounce from an increased range on a Hunted enemy closest to the cursor. Nidalee can Pounce to a target location near a Hunted enemy if she is close to the Hunted enemy.

3.text: Takedown and  Aspect of the Cougar can be cast during the dash. Pounce will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Takedown and Aspect of the Cougar can be cast during the dash. Pounce will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Nidalee slashes in an arc in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Nidalee slashes in an arc in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

0.text: Active: Nidalee switches between her Human Form and Cougar Form.
0.html: Active: Nidalee switches between her Human Form and Cougar Form.

1.text: Cougar Form: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining  melee attacks with  125 range and access to her cougar abilities.
1.html: Cougar Form: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining melee attacks with  125 range and access to her cougar abilities.

2.text: Human Form: Nidalee transforms into a human, gaining  ranged attacks with 525  range and access to her human abilities. While in Human Form, applying a  Hunted mark will  reset Aspect of the Cougar's cooldown.
2.html: Human Form: Nidalee transforms into a human, gaining ranged attacks with 525  range and access to her human abilities. While in Human Form, applying a Hunted mark will  reset Aspect of the Cougar's cooldown.

3.text: Nidalee begins with one rank in Aspect of the Cougar and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16. Cougar Form's abilities scale based on Aspect of the Cougar's rank.
3.html: Nidalee begins with one rank in Aspect of the Cougar and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16. Cougar Form's abilities scale based on Aspect of the Cougar's rank.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Soulrend: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (30 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SOULREND: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (30 (per champion) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:

Unique – Glory: Gain 4 stacks for each champion kill and 2 stacks for each assist, up to a maximum of 25 stacks. Lose 10 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved from Dark Seal.
